name: Rose Grey Bay Arabian Horse
description:
Arabian horses are a superior class of horses, identified by their dished head and high tail carriage. A fiery temperament makes them hard to train but, once broken, they handle well and remain loyal. Their great Health and Stamina, with good Speed and Acceleration, make them the perfect endurance horses.
Coming soon.

name: White Arabian Horse
description:
The White Arabian Horse is the best and rarest horse you can find across the lands of Red Dead Redemption 2 without needing to purchase it, and one of the best horses in the game overall, having a base value of $1,200.00.The Arabian White Horse is found exclusively near Lake Isabella, in Grizzlies West (Ambarino). See the map below for the exact location where to find it.Where to find the rare White Arabian Horse in Red Dead Redemption 2 (Wild Horse Habitat Map Location):
Coming soon.

name: Dark Bay Turkoman Horse
description: Turkomans are multi-class with characteristics of both race and war horses. They can be identified by their slender but agile build, and also their sleek coat.

name: Silver Dapple Pinto Missouri Fox Trotter
description: The Missouri Fox Trotter is renowned for the calm stride making them a perfect choice for riding. Their strong build and great Stamina also make them excellent work horses. This breed is healthy and fast.

name: Warped Brindle Arabian Horse
description:
The Warped Brindle Arabian is an exclusive Wild Horse only available in the Story Mode of Red Dead Redemption 2. It's a fast and agile mount.The Warped Brindle Arabian Horse can be found exclusively near the Wapiti Indian Reservation. It can be tamed and obtained for free. See the map below for the exact location where to find it.Where to find the rare Warped Brindle Arabian Horse in Red Dead Redemption 2 PC Edition (Wild Horse Habitat Map Location):Credit goes to theswedishtrex on Reddit for the location image and the screenshots below.
Coming soon.
breed: Arabian HorseNovember 5, 201930.00Previously  exclusive to the PC version of Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode, this horse was added to other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Cremello Gold Dutch Warmblood (Buell)
description: This rare Cremello Gold coat style variation of the Dutch Warmblood Horse can be obtained exclusively as part of "The Veteran IV" Stranger Side Mission quest.The horse, named "Buell", belonged to army veteran Hamish Sinclair.The Dutch Warmblood breed is known for good health and agility, and this Cremello Gold Dutch Warmblood is the best horse of its breed, with the highest Stamina, Speed and Acceleration.
breed:
Dutch WarmbloodOctober 26, 201860.00Arthur MorganHamish Sinclair

The Veteran (Stranger Side Mission)

name: Dappled Black Thoroughbred
description: This thoroughbred racehorse sporting a beautiful reverse-dappled black coat will keep you at the front of the pack with its exceptional speed and acceleration.You will also get the exclusive Nuevo Paraiso Saddle, handmade in dark chocolate leather with silver medallion detailing. This horse and saddle are available in Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode.
breed:
ThoroughbredOctober 26, 201830.00Special Edition exclusive - FREE for Special Edition players

Chapter 2

name: Black Chestnut Thoroughbred
description: Outrun the competition with this thoroughbred racehorse in a striking black chestnut coat. Also receive the exclusive High Plains Cutting Saddle, beautifully crafted in jet-black leather with gold metal accents. This horse and saddle are available in Red Dead Online.
breed: ThoroughbredNovember 27, 201830.00Ultimate Edition exclusive -  FREE for Ultimate Edition players

name: Red Chestnut Arabian Horse
description:
A fleet-footed beast with a distinctive coat.Known for its speed and handling, the Red Chestnut Arabian Horse is in a class above most horses you would find in the wild, with performance a step up from the first tier of available horses.
Coming soon.
breed: 1Arabian HorseNovember 27, 201830.00The horse was free as 30 Days Early Access Content for PS4 players. Previously available in Red Dead Online only, this horse was added to Story Mode for the PC Release of RDR2 on November 5, 2019 and for other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Perlino Andalusian Horse
description: The Perlino Andalusian Horse has higher stamina for longer rides and can be acquired for free along with a new saddle and saddlebags.Andalusians are powerful, compact war horses. This breed of horses is courageous and will not be spooked easily. They handle well, with average Acceleration and Speed, and are known for their good Health and increased Stamina, making them great for long journeys and perfect for hunting.
breed: 1Andalusian HorseMay 21, 201970.00The horse was made available on May 21, 2019 for free as PS4 Early Access, then made available for Xbox One players on June 25, 2019. Previously available in Red Dead Online only, this horse was added to Story Mode for the PC Release of RDR2 on November 5, 2019 and for other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Chocolate Roan Dutch Warmblood
description: Dutch Warmblood breed of horse is the largest type of work horse. Their breed is known for good heath, agility and speed.

name: Iron Grey Ardennes (War Horse)
description: This handsome iron-grey-colored Ardennes War Horse can always be relied on in the heat of the battle. With greater courage and stamina than the average steed, this is a horse that knows how to keep its head under fire.
breed:
ArdennesOctober 26, 201870.00Pre-Order Bonus exclusive - FREE for players who pre-ordered

Chapter 2

name: Palomino Dapple American Standardbred
description: American Standardbred horses are one of the fastest breed making them excellent for racing. This breed handles well, is easy to train, but can be frightened by loud noises. They are healthy, and their average Stamina allows them to maintain a fast pace for a long time.

name: Tiger Striped Bay Mustang
description: Where to find the rare Tiger Striped Bay Mustang Horse in Red Dead Redemption 2 (Wild Horse Habitat Map Location):

name: Sorrel Breton
breed: Breton HorseSeptember 10, 201940.00Available for Free for owners of the Ultimate Edition.

name: Red Roan Breton
breed: Breton HorseSeptember 10, 201940.00Available for Free for owners of the Ultimate Edition.

name: Few Spots Appaloosa
breed: AppaloosaNovember 5, 201930.00Previously  exclusive to the PC version of Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode, this horse was added to other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Flaxen Chestnut Hungarian Halfbred
description: Hungarian Halfbred horse are renowned for its fearlessness making them perfect for loud and dangerous situations. They handle well but are less healthy than other war horses. Their Stamina levels are good, with average Speed and Acceleration.

name: Tobiano American Paint Horse
description: The American Paint horse breed is healthy, with a reasonable amount of Speed and great Stamina; perfect for ranch work.

name: Blanket Appaloosa
description: Appaloosa breed of horses are known for their good health, agility and speed which makes them a popular choice for hard labor tasks.Their willing and manageable temperament leads to easy handling. This breed of horse is healthy, with a reasonable amount of Speed and great Stamina; perfect for ranch work.

name: Gold Palomino Tennessee Walker
breed: Tennessee WalkerNovember 5, 201930.00Previously  exclusive to the PC version of Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode, this horse was added to other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Overo American Paint Horse
description: The American Paint horse breed is healthy, with a reasonable amount of Speed and great Stamina; perfect for ranch work.

name: Liver Chestnut Morgan Horse
breed: Morgan HorseNovember 5, 201920.00Previously  exclusive to the PC version of Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode, this horse was added to other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Buttermilk Buckskin Kentucky Saddler
breed: Kentucky SaddlerNovember 5, 201930.00Previously  exclusive to the PC version of Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode, this horse was added to other platforms on December 13, 2019.

name: Raven Black Shire Horse
description:
The Raven Black Shire Horse is automatically given to the player in Red Dead Redemption 2 during the mission "Exit Pursued by a Bruised Ego" (Chapter 2), when first getting introduced to Horse Stables and to buy and sell horses.The Shire horse is the largest breed of horse. Their large build makes them perfect for heavy labor.
Coming soon.

name: Mahogany Bay Tennessee Walker
description: The Mahogany Bay Tennessee Walker is the first playable horse used by the protagonist of Red Dead Redemption 2 Arthur Morgan. It's stolen by the player during the first mission, "Outlaws from the West", and is kept as the first official horse to bond with.

name: Chestnut Tennessee Walker
description: Tennessee Walker breed of horses are renowned for their elegant looks and smooth riding making them perfect for long journeys.

name: Seal Brown Thoroughbred (Rachel)
description: This rare unique Seal Brown coat style variation of the Thoroughbred Horse can be obtained exclusively as part of the Epilogue of Red Dead Redemption 2.The horse, named "Rachel", belongs to John Marston and has improved statistics compared to the average Thoroughbred.Thoroughbred horses are renowned for their speed and agility which makes them excellent race horses.

name: Bay Roan Morgan Horse
description: Morgan horses are considered to be low maintenance and make the perfect horse for long journeys and pull carriages or carts. They are known for having poor Health and Acceleration. Their Speed and Stamina are average, making them suitable for shorter journeys.

name: Palomino Morgan Horse
description: Morgan horses are considered to be low maintenance and make the perfect horse for long journeys and pull carriages or carts. They are known for having poor Health and Acceleration. Their Speed and Stamina are average, making them suitable for shorter journeys.

name: Red Roan Tennessee Walker
description: Tennessee Walker breed of horses are renowned for their elegant looks and smooth riding making them perfect for long journeys.
